overview: Jeffrey A. Harris is a Managing Director of the private equity firm Warburg Pincus. During his career, Mr. Harris has worked extensively in the industrial and technology sectors. Currently he leads the firmâ€™s investment activities in the energy sector, a practice area that he helped create. Mr. Harris worked in Warburg Pincusâ€™ London office from 1991 to 1994 to help develop the firmâ€™s European investment activities. He is a director of Bill Barrett Corporation, Competitive Power Ventures, Deepwater Holdings, ElectroMagnetic GeoServices ASA, Knoll, Kosmos Energy, Laredo Petroleum and Nuance Communications. Mr. Harris served previously on the boards of Spinnaker Exploration, Newfield Exploration and Comcast UK Cable. He is past Chairman of the National Venture Capital Association and currently a member of the board of trustees for the Cranbrook Educational Community. In addition, Mr. Harris is an adjunct professor at the Columbia University Graduate School of Business where he teaches courses on venture capital, innovation and entrepreneurship.
